subject: p15114531
History: -year-old woman with tracheobronchomalacia, pneumonia and increased shortness of breath. Evaluate for any interval changes.
Impression: AP chest compared to : Dense consolidation in all the basal segments of the left lower lobe has progressed since. This could be either chronic collapse, or less likely chronic collapse with a component of pneumonia. Right lung is clear. Left pleural effusion, small if any, is a function of the persistent basal atelectasis. Heart size is normal.
